addartifact.name: AddArtifact
addartifact.description: Grants permission to add an Artifact for the given Agent Instance

addcontrol.name: AddControl
addcontrol.description: Grants permission to add a customer managed Control

batchdeletepentests.name: BatchDeletePentests
batchdeletepentests.description: Grants permission to delete multiple penetration tests in a single request

batchgetagentinstances.name: BatchGetAgentInstances
batchgetagentinstances.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple agent instances in a single request

batchgetartifactmetadata.name: BatchGetArtifactMetadata
batchgetartifactmetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve one or more Artifact Metadata records for the given Agent Instance

batchgetfindings.name: BatchGetFindings
batchgetfindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple security testing findings in a single request

batchgetpentestjobs.name: BatchGetPentestJobs
batchgetpentestjobs.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple security testing jobs in a single request

batchgetpentests.name: BatchGetPentests
batchgetpentests.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple penetration tests in a single request

batchgetsecuritytestcontentmetadata.name: BatchGetSecurityTestContentMetadata
batchgetsecuritytestcontentmetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple security testing contents metadata in a single request

batchgettasks.name: BatchGetTasks
batchgettasks.description: Grants permission to retrieve multiple security testing tasks in a single request

createagentinstance.name: CreateAgentInstance
createagentinstance.description: Grants permission to create an agent instance record

createapplication.name: CreateApplication
createapplication.description: Grants permission to create a new application

createdocumentreview.name: CreateDocumentReview
createdocumentreview.description: Grants permission to create a document review

createintegration.name: CreateIntegration
createintegration.description: Grants permission to create a security testing integration

createmembership.name: CreateMembership
createmembership.description: Grants permission to add a single member to a agent instance with specified role

createonetimeloginsession.name: CreateOneTimeLoginSession
createonetimeloginsession.description: Grants permission to create a one time login session

createpentest.name: CreatePentest
createpentest.description: Grants permission to create a new penetration test configuration

deleteagentinstance.name: DeleteAgentInstance
deleteagentinstance.description: Grants permission to delete an agent instance record

deleteartifact.name: DeleteArtifact
deleteartifact.description: Grants permission to delete an Artifact

deletecontrol.name: DeleteControl
deletecontrol.description: Grants permission to delete a customer managed Control

deleteintegration.name: DeleteIntegration
deleteintegration.description: Grants permission to delete the integration of an application

deletemembership.name: DeleteMembership
deletemembership.description: Grants permission to remove a single member associated to an agent instance

describefindings.name: DescribeFindings
describefindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve security findings for a penetration test or security testing tasks in a penetration test

getapplication.name: GetApplication
getapplication.description: Grants permission to get application details by application ID

getartifact.name: GetArtifact
getartifact.description: Grants permission to retrieve an Artifact for the given Agent Instance

getcodereviewtask.name: GetCodeReviewTask
getcodereviewtask.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Code Review Task

getcontrol.name: GetControl
getcontrol.description: Grants permission to retrieve a Control

getdocreviewtask.name: GetDocReviewTask
getdocreviewtask.description: Grants permission to retrieve a document review task

getdocumentreview.name: GetDocumentReview
getdocumentreview.description: Grants permission to get the status of the associated agent instance document review

getdocumentreviewartifact.name: GetDocumentReviewArtifact
getdocumentreviewartifact.description: Grants permission to get document review artifact for a specific document

getintegration.name: GetIntegration
getintegration.description: Grants permission to get the integration metadata by ID

getloginsessioncredentials.name: GetLoginSessionCredentials
getloginsessioncredentials.description: Grants permission to retrieve credentials for a one time login session

handleonetimeloginsession.name: HandleOneTimeLoginSession
handleonetimeloginsession.description: Grants permission to process and invalidate a one time login session

initiateproviderregistration.name: InitiateProviderRegistration
initiateproviderregistration.description: Grants permission to initiate the registration of Security Agent App for the given provider (eg: GitHub)

listagentinstancetasks.name: ListAgentInstanceTasks
listagentinstancetasks.description: Grants permission to list tasks for a specific agent instance

listagentinstances.name: ListAgentInstances
listagentinstances.description: Grants permission to list agent instances

listapplications.name: ListApplications
listapplications.description: Grants permission to list all applications in the account

listartifacts.name: ListArtifacts
listartifacts.description: Grants permission to list all artifacts for the given project

listcontrols.name: ListControls
listcontrols.description: Grants permission to list all Controls

listdiscoveredendpoints.name: ListDiscoveredEndpoints
listdiscoveredendpoints.description: Grants permission to list discovered endpoints associated with a pentest job with optional URI prefix filtering

listdocumentreviewcomments.name: ListDocumentReviewComments
listdocumentreviewcomments.description: Grants permission to list document review comments

listdocumentreviews.name: ListDocumentReviews
listdocumentreviews.description: Grants permission to list all document reviews for the given project

listfindings.name: ListFindings
listfindings.description: Grants permission to list findings with filtering and pagination support

listintegratedresources.name: ListIntegratedResources
listintegratedresources.description: Grants permission to list integrated resources for an agent instance

listintegrations.name: ListIntegrations
listintegrations.description: Grants permission to get the integrations owned by the caller's AWS account

listmemberships.name: ListMemberships
listmemberships.description: Grants permission to list all members associated to an agent instance with pagination support

listpentestjobsforpentest.name: ListPentestJobsForPentest
listpentestjobsforpentest.description: Grants permission to list penetration test jobs associated with a penetration test

listpentests.name: ListPentests
listpentests.description: Grants permission to list penetration tests with optional filtering by status

listresourcesfromintegration.name: ListResourcesFromIntegration
listresourcesfromintegration.description: Grants permission to list resources from Integration

listtasks.name: ListTasks
listtasks.description: Grants permission to list security testing tasks associated with a pentest job

startcoderemediation.name: StartCodeRemediation
startcoderemediation.description: Grants permission to start code remediation for the findings

startpentestexecution.name: StartPentestExecution
startpentestexecution.description: Grants permission to initiate the execution of a penetration test

stoppentestexecution.name: StopPentestExecution
stoppentestexecution.description: Grants permission to stop the execution of a running penetration test

togglemanagedcontrol.name: ToggleManagedControl
togglemanagedcontrol.description: Grants permission to toggle the status

updateagentinstance.name: UpdateAgentInstance
updateagentinstance.description: Grants permission to update an agent instance record

updateapplication.name: UpdateApplication
updateapplication.description: Grants permission to update application configuration

updatecontrol.name: UpdateControl
updatecontrol.description: Grants permission to update a customer managed Control

updatefinding.name: UpdateFinding
updatefinding.description: Grants permission to update an existing security finding with new details or status

updateintegratedresources.name: UpdateIntegratedResources
updateintegratedresources.description: Grants permission to update integrated resources for an agent instance

updatepentest.name: UpdatePentest
updatepentest.description: Grants permission to update an existing penetration test with new configuration or settings

verifytargetdomain.name: VerifyTargetDomain
verifytargetdomain.description: Grants permission to verify ownership for a registered target domain in an agent instance
